text.value: 2. Have you received training on the detection, recording and reporting of diseases transmissible between animals and humans?

2 Je, umepata mafunzo juu ya kutambua, kuhifadhi na kutuma taarifa za magonjwa yaambukizwayo kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
